title: Contract creation silently fails
body:
Steps to reproduce issue:
- compile solidity contract:

``` solidity
contract test {
  function multiply(uint a) constant returns(uint d) {
    return a * 7;
  }
};
```

the output is:

```
605180600c6000396000f3007c0100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000600035048063c6888fa114602d57005b60366004356040565b8060005260206000f35b6000600782029050604c565b91905056
```
-  then make a transaction;
- everything looks fine I get address

```
0x6cafb2c9a07564e0f869e37cc1fe64ec940f65ff
```

and in the logs i can see

```
I0513 11:28:48.301941   14290 xeth.go:929] Tx(3c7dbb011c2f09b31d1cef93411afdfc39dade87b307adf8f97b1e0625fbd75d) created: 6cafb2c9a07564e0f869e37cc1fe64ec940f65ff

> I0513 11:28:55.857397   14290 chain_manager.go:580] Split detected. New head #320247 (0d6d976a) TD=26109574175091, was #320246 (10eb3767) TD=26109142154882
I0513 11:28:55.858046   14290 chain_manager.go:628] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) in 5.646801ms. #320247 [0d6d976a / 0d6d976a]

> I0513 11:28:58.289306   14290 chain_manager.go:628] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 1 ignored) in 10.688978ms. #320248 [53221bf8 / 53221bf8]
I0513 11:28:58.289472   14290 chain_manager.go:628] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) in 12.818581ms. #320248 [53221bf8 / 53221bf8]
> I0513 11:29:09.535899   14290 chain_manager.go:628]
```
-  But contract methods do not work. Also after calling

```
> web3.eth.getCode('0x6cafb2c9a07564e0f869e37cc1fe64ec940f65ff')
```

the result is `0x`

Last time I've checked this (~3 weeks ago) everything was working perfectly. Today I couldn't make it work.
